message: Anybody here order an iPad 2 online? I placed my order in less than an hour from the time that the iPad 2 was available to buy online. The sucker is still in Asia, although they're promising it'll be here by Thursday. Anyone else?
I live an hour from the US border, and there is a place called "At the Border Storage" that you can ship to. I ordered from the US. :)
U can already order ipad2 online in Canada?? I thought that was gonna start on Friday morning at 1?
Any idea on possible wait times in Canada?
I'm on the Canada apple site and you can't pre order online. !
Just got shortened by two days.
3-4 weeks for on-line orders placed today.
My order is up to 4-5 weeks, and has been that way for almost 3 weeks now.
